abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Loan
            will support the Government's medium-term structural
            adjustment and development program, a program designed to
            increase exports and promote domestic savings, to permit a
            sustained recovery of economic growth and reduced
            unemployment while strengthening the country's
            creditworthiness. The main areas covered by the program are:
            (i) maintaining the macroeconomic framework developed in the
            last few years; (ii) a reduction of the public sector
            deficit; (iii) improving public investment programming and
            implementation; (iv) strengthening of prudential regulations
            and Central Bank's supervision to maintain the banking
            systems solvency; (v) restructuring of distressed commercial
            banks; (vi) rationalizing the role of the Banco Republica;
            and (vii) improving the legal framework regulating
            commercial, corporate, and productive activities as well as
            modernizing and expediting judicial procedures. The loan
            will finance eligible imports.
